title: Is it necessary to solve NCERT Exemplar for Class 10 Maths provided I have solved NCERT by R.D. Sharma or M.L. Aggarwal? - Quora
tags: National Council of Educational Research and Training (NCERT)

response.answer_text: Not at all, if you completed NCERT and may be RD Sharma(NCERT is not written by RD Sharma as mentioned in your question),then there is no need to solve NCERT Exemplar because this is more then enough but in my suggestion do only one thing now,refer to the past year papers because this will surely boost your confidence. Hopefully! This Helps You.
Don't worry what you have done till now is enough. No need to solve exempler just move to previous year papers.
